name: Reine: Peafowl Legend
description:
UPDATE: 11/24/21 - Due to popular demand, I have uploaded Mac and Linux versions of the game. Keep in mind I don't have either of these operating systems on hand to test, but any feedback you have is probably universal to all builds.

This is a non-profit fan-game. Pavolia Reine is associated with Hololive Indonesia and Cover Corp.

Once again, Reine has found herself in a strange new world, full of whimsy and wonder. What could possibly go wrong?

- A brand new adventure featuring Pavolia Reine
- You can fish! Lots of items to collect!

This is a Playable Demo! This isn't the whole game, but I hope you'll look forward to future developments! Please refer to readme.txt if you wish to contact me with feedback/bug reports/etc

This and the final game will be 100% free. You shouldn't have paid anything for this, and if you have, please contact me as you would above.

Don't forget to visit Pavolia Reine's channel in the link below, and consider joining the RoyalTEA!
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UChgTyjG-pdNvxxhdsXfHQ5Q
